IvyEditorColors¶

Colors used on custom editors. Some change with the editor skin.

  • Background_Active

  • Background_Hover

  • Background_Normal

  • Button_Dark

  • Button_Disabled

  • Button_Light

  • Error

  • Header_Active

  • Header_Hover

  • Header_Normal

  • Splitter

GET HELP¶

Join this Discord server to get help, suggest new features, and vote on future updates!

  • Color32
